response.overview: In the most exciting and unpredictable year of MotoGP ever Marc Marquez proves his titanic skill and ability - scoring five wins to Lorenzo and Rossi's two apiece (at the time of writing) to secure his third MotoGP title in four years.  And what a year 2016 has been. MotoGP is just going from strength to strength and 2016 proved to be yet another astonishing year of racing at the very highest level, setting a record for the most number of new winners in one season (four) and the longest consecutive run of races with different winners (eight).
response.title: MotoGP 2016 Review
